name: Dropwp Generator
author: Dropwp

sections.description:
This plugin is a “quick start helper” to create a WooCommerce shop with some useful plugins.

Selected plugins:

  • WooCommerce
  • WooCommerce PDF Invoices & Packing Slips
  • Woocommerce Brand
  • Asesor de Cookies para normativa española
  • User Switching
  • Duplicate post
  • All in One SEO Pack
  • qTranslate X
  • All in One SEO Pack & qTranslate-X
  • WooCommerce & qTranslate-X
  • Jetpack by WordPress.com
  • Dropwp NIF
  • Woo Weight Shipping
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/dropwp_generator directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Automatic notices will be show when needed to install or update plugins

short_description: Plugin helper to quick install a WooCommerce shop.
